text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

text: Winning isn't everything--but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
author: John Bingham

text: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
author: Phil Jackson

text: The score never interested me, only the game.
author: Mae West

text: I've never lost a game I just ran out of time.
author: Michael Jordan

text: I feel the need to endanger myself every so often.
author: Tim Daly

text: Have you noticed that whatever sport you're trying to learn, some earnest person is always telling you to keep your knees bent?
author: Dave Barry

text: Some seek the comfort of their therapist's office, other head to the corner pub and dive into a pint, but I chose running as my therapy.
author: Dean Karnazes

text: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately so is losing.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: I love the Olympics, because they enable people from all over the world to come together and,regardless of their political or cultural differences,accuse each other of cheating
author: Dave Barry

text: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
author: William Arthur Ward

text: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: Don't let them drag you down by rumors just go with what you believe in.
author: Michael Jordan

text: football is like life - it requires perserverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
author: vince lombardi

text: The thing about football - the important thing about football - is that it is not just about football.
author: Terry Pratchett

text: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
author: Wilt Chamberlain

text: Stay true to yourself and listen to your inner voice. It will lead you to your dream.
author: James Ross

text: Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
author: Knute Rockne

text: Baseball players are smarter than football players. How often do you see a baseball team penalized for too many men on the field?
author: Jim Bouton

text: I'm the best there is, the best there was, and the best there ever will be.
author: Bret Hart

text: The strong one doesn't win, the one that wins is strong.
author: Franz beckenbauer

text: (Baseball) is a game with a lot of waiting in it; it is a game with increasingly heightened anticipation of increasingly limited action.
author: John Irving

text: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.
author: Eric Liddell

text: Everything you need is already inside.
author: William J. Bowerman

text: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
author: Dan Gable

text: There are no environments where you're only going to win, because life just isn't like that.
author: Bobby Orr

text: I realize im black, but id like to be viewed as a person, and that is everybodys wish.
author: Michael Jordan

text: if you gone come in second, you're just the first loser!
author: Tiger Woods

text: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
author: Satchel Paige

text: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.
author: Mike Singletary

text: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's 'come, stop, come, stop.' There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
author: Michael Jordan

text: Football is an incredible game. Sometimes it's so incredible, it's unbelievable.
author: Tom Landry

text: a lot of football success is in the mind. you must believe you are the best and then make sure that you are.
author: bill shankly

text: Swimming is simply moving meditation.
author: Cesar Nikko Caharian

text: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
author: Ted Williams

text: here are only three sports: bullfighting, motor racing, and mountaineering; all the rest are merely games.
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: Any game becomes important when you know and love the players.
author: W.P. Kinsella

text: Other than sports, only war and catastrophe can create this sort of national unity.
author: Simon Kuper

text: Baseball is a public trust. Players turn over, owners turn over and certain commissioners turn over. But baseball goes on.
author: Peter Ueberroth

text: Basketball is like war in that offensive weapons are developed first, and it always takes a while for the defense to catch up.
author: Red Auerbach

text: ennis taught me to take chances, to take life as it comes. To hit every ball that comes to me no matter how hard it looks, to give it my best shot.
author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

text: Baseball is what we were. Football is what we have become.
author: Mary McGrory

text: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
author: Herbert Hoover

text: You can learn a lot about business by watching sports. Some of the strategies you see being executed in a sports game can actually be translated into business terms and executed to achieve business success.
author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith Jr

text: Play as big as you dream.
author: Emma Kress

text: A good Athlete may not be a good Coach, likewise, a good Coach may not be a good Athlete.
author: Dido Stargaze

text: When life throws you a curveball, hit out of the park.
author: Shanka Jayasinha

text: RUN when you can, WALK if you have to, CRAWL if you must.JUST NEVER GIVE UP
author: Dean Karnazes

text: I am in competition with my accomplishments.
author: SeKeithia Johnson

text: No matter how good you get you can always get better, and that's the exciting part.
author: Tiger Woods

text: Good coaches tell you where the fish are, great coaches teach you how to find them.
author: Kobe Bryant

text: Scoring a goal is almost like kissing. The more you do it, the more you want. I wanted to keep scoring until it hurt.
author: Yamile Saied Méndez

text: sports is like a meditation , timeless focused concentrated action. No manipulation..but pure focus, pure action.
author: Ravindra Shukla

text: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
author: Tim Green

text: You will be exceptional only few times, but you can be excellent all the times.
author: Amit Kalantri

text: Dance like you love to dance.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: It's when it's at it's toughest that you have to think like a winner.
author: T Jay Taylor

text: Don't do things simply because you can do them. Have an extraordinary reason behind your actions; Let your heart guide you.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

text: Mindset is the most important factor for success in any sports.
author: Abhishek Ratna

text: Running is a form of practiced stoicism. It means teaching your brain and body to be biochemically comfortable in a state of disrepair.
author: Matthew Inman

text: Our weakness is our opponent’s strength.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

text: I love the suffering that goes into the sport, to become the best.
author: Tj Eisenhart

text: My opinion is that a school with no playground isn't a school at all.
author: Mohith Agadi

text: Sports creates complicated men, proud enough to refuse to admit their mistakes, but humble enough always to put their team first.
author: Fredrik Backman

text: The only thing the sport gives us are moments.
author: Fredrik Backman

text: You are not a dead man. This is no time pass. Do not just play. Play for Life. Treat this game as Game for Life.
author: Pragya Tiwari

text: Train like you are the worst player, play like you are the best player.
author: Amit Kalantri

text: The greatest skill the best athletes in the world possess is their ability to listen.
author: Emma Chase

text: There is no 'i' in team. But there are two in motivation.
author: T. Jay Taylor

text: In football, a good coach will game plan against the opposing team based upon strengths and weaknesses, how they match up, and paying attention to details.A great coach will game plan against the opposing coach’s game plan.
author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

text: Sports leads the country to unity; politics leads the country to diversity.
author: Amit Kalantri

text: The winner in sports does not only have physical abilities but unique mental abilities.
author: Sunday Adelaja

text: In sports, it is not the strongest, who wins, but the most practical and skillful
author: Sunday Adelaja

text: Sports teach us the value of facing yourself and others honestly. You can only grow if you let go of denial and embrace what is real and true.
author: Corey Irwin

text: Success may require a lot of days. But progress only requires one.
author: T. Jay Taylor

text: Like books, sports give people a sense of having lived other lives, of taking part in other people’s victories. And defeats. When sports are at their best, the spirit of the fan merges with the spirit of the athlete.
author: Phil Knight

text: The team that keeps winning is not the most talented but the most hard-working.
author: Zoltan Andrejkovics

text: It’s the Olympics. If you can’t get up to swim early in the morning, don’t go.
author: Michael Phelps

text: Love of sports will always break your heart, but in doing so, it reminds us we have one.
author: Stuart Stevens

text: If you can't support us when we lose or draw, don't support us when we win.
author: Bill Shankly

text: Fight if you must, work hard, give your best but never quit in the face of difficulty.
author: Sanchita Pandey

text: If you stop fighting for what you want, what you don't want will automatically take over
author: Gordon Attard

text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Play to win but never fear to lose. Win or lose-either way you are a winner.
author: Debasish Mridha

text: It's nice to be pushed, when you're being pushed in the right direction.
author: Kent Allen

text: Early morning exercise will keep you active for the entire day.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

text: Remember, it's a long race and you can always outwork talent in the end.
author: Matthew Quick

text: The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
author: Alcurtis Turner

text: Getting more exercise isn’t only good for your waistline. It's a natural anti-depressant, that leaves you in a great mood.
author: Auliq Ice

text: If you want to be the best, be the best, if you are not the best, pretend you are.
author: Muhhamad Ali

text: Being strong is not how hard you hit but its as hard you can get hit and keep going that is how winning is done.
author: Rocky

text: The idea here is simple, if you can dream it, it is possible.
author: Ernest Riveras Tobia

text: A lost is a lost no matter if you loose by 1 point or 40 points it's still a lost.
author: Alcurtis Turner

text: If you make lots of little changes to your lifestyle, you’ll need to make time to have some fun too, otherwise life can get a little boring.
author: Auliq Ice

text: To be a professional you have to act like one as well.
author: Alcurtis Turner

text: Being strong means that you are made of steel.
author: Pēteris Bitāns

text: You settle for less, you get less.
author: Brandi L. Bates

text: Be fair. Play hard.
author: Dan Venezia

text: Train hard while others don't, so you can win while your opponents wont.
author: Andre Bramble

text: Football is the poetry of a motion.
author: Pubudu Lasal Dissanayake

text: Nobody will outwork, out-train or out-will me !
author: Andre Bramble

text: The sad fact of life: Winners love the game. Losers don't.
author: The Wombat

text: oliticians and sports coaches both need to be smart enough to master the game, but dumb enough to think it matters.
author: David Mitchell

text: Think of yourself as an athlete. I guarantee you it will change the way you walk, the way you work, and the decisions you make about leadership, teamwork, and success.
author: Mariah Burton Nelson

text: he only one who can tell you ‘you can’t win’ is you and you don’t have to listen.
author: Jessica Ennis-Hill

text: I’d rather regret the risks that didn’t work out than the chances I didn’t take at all.
author: Simone Biles

text: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
author: Ernie Banks

text: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

text: Somebody gives you an opportunity, say yes to it. So what if you fail? you won’t know if you fail or succeed unless you try.
author: Ann Meyers

text: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.
author: Laird Hamilton

text: What makes something special is not just what you have to gain, but what you feel there is to lose.
author: Andre Agassi

text: You win some, you lose some, and some get rained out, but you gotta suit up for them all.
author: J. Askenberg

text: Always work hard, never give up, and fight until the end because it’s never really over until the whistle blows.
author: Alex Morgan

text: You must not only have competitiveness but ability, regardless of the circumstance you face, to never quit.
author: Abby Wambach

text: I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.
author: Bruce Jenner

text: Sports serve society by providing vivid examples of excellence.
author: George F. Will

text: You should never stay at the same level. Always push yourself to the next.
author: Marnelli Dimzon

text: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
author: Babe Ruth

text: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
author: Bob Feller

text: To find a man's true character, play golf with him.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

text: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.
author: Earl Monroe

text: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.
author: Bob Hope

text: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
author: Casey Stengel

text: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.
author: Ian Botham

text: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.
author: Jack Benny

text: Life is about timing.
author: Carl Lewis

text: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
author: Robert Griffin III

text: Show me a good loser, and I'll show you a loser.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: I'm a competitive person and I love the challenge of mastering new things.
author: Sasha Cohen

text: Sports are a microcosm of society.
author: Billie Jean King

text: Olympism is the marriage of sport and culture.
author: Juan Antonio Samaranch

text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
author: Mario Lopez

text: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me: camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.
author: Kobe Bryant

text: It takes hard work, dedication, discipline and a positive attitude to get to the top - in business or in sports.
author: George Blanda

text: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
author: Ferdinand Porsche

text: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

text: There is a syndrome in sports called 'paralysis by analysis.'
author: Arthur Ashe

text: Sports teaches us to be together and united.
author: Neeraj Chopra

text: In sports and in business, the greatest leaders are those who make the best decisions in the most crucial of situations. They are the ones who focus their energy on turning tough decisions into winning decisions.
author: Don Yaeger

text: Every child should have time for arts, music, sports, drama, robotics, school newspapers and the like, not to mention recess and play.
author: Chris Gabrieli

text: Economics is about creating win-win situations. But in sports, someone loses.
author: Stan Kroenke

text: Apart from education, you need good health, and for that, you need to play sports.
author: Kapil Dev

text: I love sports because it takes me away from reality, and I tell people, 'No matter how bad your life is, if you are having problems at home, you are having problems at work, that's the beauty of sports.'
author: Charles Barkley

text: Sports without music is just a game. Music makes it entertaining.
author: Ice Cube

text: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.
author: Peggy Fleming

text: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality.
author: Pierre de Coubertin

text: Sports is like a war without the killing.
author: Ted Turner

text: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose-it teaches you about life.
author: Billie Jean King

text: Sports is a metaphor for overcoming obstacles and achieving against great odds. Athletes, in times of difficulty, can be important role models.
author: Bill Bradley
